5ce563f9f26b728c8285aaf9447d341b87cc0dd657c8c3de5cc1c9e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://82314bc164de80b69498419ec4fd5a96cd19ee2663af627307d42d5ad03514c7","dweb:/ipfs/QmQeV7Vs4Rvr1WDBisKwtojkPA6pUCEH9xSJDNrvrw2YHN"]},"src/libs/Errors.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbfffdfb8e8b0b0a738c55ce943909bf80ccc020133c9310df8961cdbbfcb5b3a","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://f0406f5f0e37a3f878da3aec56226de1f8be50f2e7b200b88a2960f4a34d7775","dweb:/ipfs/QmTaon7taCRsrKKyX6V6pCAuo4krNjTTo8bgqACjqxedZC"]},"src/libs/Structs.sol":{"keccak256":"0x08c1e025c3daf42168cb977c352607ccf3b068331851594dddc6fad3646e3721","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://86f900c2926e4cd40693175076718e0e81bc70c8d0502b8a62391a47b9c059ac","dweb:/ipfs/QmfD1S5aFRY9HnhibLZLVP81PzKrqM6ej5VgZjSkL9Qcqz"]}},"version":1}

addOrgAdmin(address).details: Only callable by the owner, reverts if the address is zero Address or the address is already an Org Admin

params._admin: The address of the Org Admin to add

addOrgIssuer(address).details: Only callable by Org Admins, reverts if the address is zero Address or the address is already an Org Issuer

params._issuer: The address of the Org Issuer to add

params._orgAdmins: An array of addresses that will be given the ORG_ADMIN_ROLE
params._orgIssuers: An array of addresses that will be given the ORG_ISSUER_ROLE

createLCert(string,string,uint256,bool,b.details: The certificate is created by deploying a LCert contract

params._creator: The address of the creator of the certificate
params._issuersForCert: An array of addresses that will be given the ORG_ISSUER_ROLE for the certificate
params._maxSupply: The maximum supply of the certificate

returns._0: certsArray An array of all certificates created

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeOrgAdmin(address).details: Only callable by the owner, reverts if the address is zero Address or the address is not an Org Admin

params._admin: The address of the Org Admin to remove

removeOrgIssuer(address).details: Only callable by Org Admins, reverts if the address is zero Address or the address is not an Org Issuer

params._issuer: The address of the Org Issuer to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

certCount().notice: The number of certificates created by the orginization

certificates(address).notice: A mapping of certificates to their contract

certs(uint256).notice: An array of all certificates created by the orginization
